brief.title: Brief
brief.description: Applications for work should be productive because of their repetitive usage. Compared to the product in use, the major flows of the clock-in app: Pie are going to be simpler. I do UI ideation of the side project on my own and have prepared an onboarding document for future members.

why.title: The Problem
why.problem: The company I worked for was using an app with clock-in, leave statistics, and salary information features. One had to go back to the “Main Menu” as he/she switched between features in the product in use. The flow could be simplified.

question.title: Question
question.content: How might we simplify the flows of the routine tasks?

flows.title: Flows Comparison
flows.description: “Main Menu” is not required for completing routine tasks. There will be “going-back-and-forths” if a user has more than one thing to do in the product in use. The Tab Bar at screen bottom comes to the flow’s rescue.

items.name: Onboarding
items.description: To work as a remote team, the members who will join the project get started with Onboarding.

items.name: Why & How
items.description: Product specification is subject to change. We write down WHY the roles we defined are using a clock-in app and HOW they are going to fulfill their goals.

items.name: Limited Resources for a Side Project
items.description: There are many tasks to accomplish accoring to Roles & Goals. The project is moving towards a complete UI flow at the moment due to the scarce time & resources.
